## Editor Demo

This is the **editor demo** for monitorat. Any widget that can be edited can be
edited here.

### How to Edit

Click the pencil icon next to any wiki or card to open the editor.

- **Edit**: Write markdown in the textarea (wiki) or edit the fields and settings
- **Preview**: Click the Preview/Editor header to preview document
- **Save**: Click Save to persist changes

### Features

Markdown Editor
- Auto-save drafts to localStorage
- Live preview with markdown-it
- localStorage persistence for drafts
- Version history (last 10 saves stored in `.versions/`)
- Shade curtain UI for toggling between editor and preview
